content: विभागः {@--1@} Division, partition, apportionment (as of inheritance); समस्तत्र विभागः स्यात् <ls>Ms. 9. 120</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 9.">210</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 114.</ls> {@--2@} The share of an inheritance. {@--3@} A part or share in general {@--4@} Division, separation, disjunction (regarded in Nyāya <ab>phil.</ab> as a Guṇa); <ls>Ku. 2. 4</ls>; <ls>Bg. 3. 28.</ls> {@--5@} The numerator of a fraction. {@--6@} A section. {@--7@} Arrangement.
